author: andschwa
body: Building from monad linux scripts introduced too many headaches for everyone. This was removed with the implementation of a top level Makefile with separate calls to native and managed bits.  Shell in a box Docker file might come back.  VSO create date - 10/27/2015 9:39:00     VSO closed date - 10/27/2015 9:40:00
title: Remove deprecated scripts directory
